segments.text: I can't believe how the woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, and she hasn't even noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children trying to get cookies, but they're being so careful not to make any noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over, and he could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and calm, it's a shame the kitchen is in such disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water streaming down the cabinet doors, causing even more of a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress and apron look so neat and clean, despite the water all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so oblivious to the water overflowing and the children being sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR
